Enter. LUK-file. Default is 5000: Enter the number of characters in the LUK-file. The number must be greater than 1000. The default is 5000:
Err. LUK-file. Greater than 1000: *** Error. The number must be greater than 1000
Err. Invalid input: *** Error. Invalid input. Use only numbers
Enter. Size LUK-file: The size of the LUK-file. Enter a number:
Err. LUK-file. Less than 1000000: *** Error. The number must be less than 1000000
Attention. LUK-file. Overwrite: If you overwrite the LUK file, it will be impossible to restore the old passwords. Continue?
